name: Railroad Tycoon: Idle Game
description:
Have you ever wanted to be the big boss? Want to know how the train station works? Want to build your very own railway empire?
Oh, you’re in the right place!
 
Railroad Tycoon is a casual business simulator with great graphics and addictive mechanics.
With the help of your trusted assistant Dave, you will have to manage and develop your station from the ground. One train and few old dusty boxcars - that's all your possessions.
 
With efficient use of resources you'll be able to launch new trains, railroads, upgrade existing ones, make good deals and expand territories!
 
It’s time to put your trains on rails!
